{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.04876v1", "title": "Hereditarily and Super Generalized co-Bassian Abelian Groups", "summary": "We completely characterize by finding necessary and sufficient conditions
those co-Bassian and generalized co-Bassian Abelian groups having,
respectively, the hereditary or the super property, thus giving a new insight
in the full discovery of the structure of these two classes of groups as
recently defined in Arch. Math. Basel (2024) by the third author.", "main_category": "math.GR", "categories": "math.GR,math.AC", "published": "2025-04-07T09:36:26Z"}
